name: Avery's Adventure 3d (Browser)
description:
**This is the HTML version = not as good performance as the other = bad game + even worse = Super bad game.*** 

In this game you are going to guide Avery to her grandma who has recently bought a new dog, but there's a problem....

Who can complete the game the fastest?

Please try not to rage...

Official website: https://averysadventuregame.weebly.com/
